no_api_key.message: No API Key found. Please enter your VirusTotal API Key in the setup page.

info_non_http.message: This site won't be scanned as only domains using HTTP or HTTPS protocols are scanned.

lead_warning.message: The site $1 has been flagged as potentially dangerous by multiple sources. Do not reveal any personal information, credit card info, or any other sensitive information. Proceed with caution.

info_about_malicious.message: Out of $1 engines, $2 have deemed this site to be malicious.

note_about_malicious.message: Note: The label "malicious" is the highest level of certainty that a site might be harmful. Even one engine marking a site as malicious should be enough to raise concerns. Always be cautious and prioritize your online safety.
